#-----------------------------------------------------------------------
#rails, ruby and related terminolgy
activerecord, ar => active record
actioncontroller, ac => action controller
actionview, av => action view
activesupport, as => active support
activeresource, ars => active resource
rails, ror => ruby on rails
db => database
mem => memory
txn => transaction
